meta.job_title: Director of Real Estate Development - Affordable Housing

duties_responsibilities.duty: Development of project acquisition and funding strategies
Preparation of financial and physical feasibility analyses of potential low-income housing sites and developments
Identification and preparation of loan, grant, and low-income housing tax credit applications
Negotiations with equity investor partners and ongoing communication with public and private lenders to secure and close financing sources
Selection and supervision of architects, consultants, contractors, and property managers
Representing the non-profit company before public agencies, elected officials, community groups, and financial institutions
Coordination with Asset Management and Resident Services staff for a successful transition of projects from construction to operation
Providing staff support to the RED Committee of the Board of Directors
Supervising, training, and providing technical advice and guidance to Project Management and/or housing development staff

education_certification.credential: Master’s Degree in business administration, public administration, community development, or related field (preferred)
